website_summaries.verdict: Even if you’ve stopped the moon from flattening Termina in 2000 on the N64, its innovative gyro controls, convenient save system, handy touch screen menu, and sharper visuals make "Majora’s Mask 3D" well-worth revisiting.
pros: Travel through time to save Termina within 72 hours, or else … Impressive use of 3D effects
Over 20 masks to collect and solve puzzles with
cons: Some players may be put off by the creepier story and characters of "Majora’s Mask

customer_reviews.title: New to Zelda
customer_reviews.text: I recently began my LoZ Journey as an adult who only heard about it as a kid. I loved Majora's Mask, but holy heck the time limit stressed me out. All in all, a fun way to pass the time and learn more about the games I missed out on as a kid. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Zelda games
customer_reviews.text: This game brings back so many fun memories second Zelda game I played after Ocarina of Time, wish I could have enjoyed Breath of the Wild as much as this game. Breath of the Wild was to stale for me and dungeons were very repetitive compared to the dungeons in this game. Hope next Zelda game takes in to account that having more tiny dungeons that are the same is not better than a couple that are very unique. This is coming from a Zelda fan.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynbleidd

customer_reviews.title: Least favorite zelda game
customer_reviews.text: I really could not get into this game. Having a constant timer till gameover was way to stressful. Additionally, the art and story telling is very dark and macabre and disturbed my children. Finally, many of the minigames were more difficult because of poor controls than because of game difficulty. I have now tried all of the zelda games and this was the only one I didn't like nor finish. I know it has a rabid fan base, but it was not for me with constant timers and starting over.
customer_reviews.author: William & Krista Foley

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game on the n64 and just having a updated looking and in portable mode? Day 1 purchase, very happy with purchase. Amazon shipped it quick which is why I'll keep buying from amazon. Thanks nintendo and thanks amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Project Pat

customer_reviews.title: It is an Amazing game
customer_reviews.text: I like the over all feel of the game. It is an amazing successor to Ocarina of time as well as a sequel. It is a little bit odd to get used the story mechanic of having to rewind time and repeatedly do things again and again but once you get the hang of it, it is easier to get into the story. It’s no wonder why it is acclaimed as one of the best Zelda games in the series. 8/10, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Best In the Series
customer_reviews.text: I've played Zelda beginning with the first in the 1980s with Zelda 1 and 2. I've played A Link to the Past, Orcarina of Time, Majoras Mask, Link's Awakening, Twilight Princess, Skyward Sword, Breath of the Wild. I can say that Majoras Mask is probably my favorite title out of all of them. It's characterized by being a quirky or dark game. The game play and theme of the game is genius. I won't spoil the story since there might be people who have never played the game. This is a game I can go back to and never get bored of since there's so much to do in the game.
customer_reviews.author: G Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Great as described
customer_reviews.text: Game was received with the other item I ordered. My only issues is the package had about a 2 in tear in it like someone was trying to look inside of it. Other than that products were as described.
customer_reviews.author: P.Reid

customer_reviews.title: Uhhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: It did not have the plastic covering and was a bit sketched out when I saw it wasn't there hoped the game was still there at least but no when I opened the box the game cartridge was missing
customer_reviews.author: Maria salazar

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This game is terrible. If I wanted to read a book, I would have bought a book. Nintendo games are GAWD AWFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Childhood Memories
customer_reviews.text: One of the first Legend of Zelda games I ever played. It brought so many memories back from my childhood. Beat it in about three days when as a kid I couldn’t even beat the third temple haha! So glad I could play this game again and add it to my collection. I highly recommend this game if you want to play a great story and learn of the best ways to handle your time.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil42

customer_reviews.title: Very good remake classic
customer_reviews.text: Just like the original majoras mask, this version tops off it and adds more content and features. If you are a collector of the zelda series, this is must to pick up before Nintendon't stops producing physical copys of this.
customer_reviews.author: maiku-tech

customer_reviews.title: Get it, duh
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games in the series, maybe I’m biased because i love the Legend of Zelda series but honestly, it’s true to the original just with better graphics, and it’s portable, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game!
customer_reviews.text: This zelda was one of my favorites when it came out and i was just a teenager. This game is soo nice you must beat it twice! I'm actually lowballing this game is soo good I'm on my 6th time playing it. It's a great game that if you beat it and give it a cpl months, you will want to play it again. And for $20 for all the playtime I'm gonna get out of this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love Zelda
customer_reviews.text: This game is a little harder than the other Zelda games - or maybe I am an idiot... but it's super fun. Love all of the Zelda games.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent game but the whole time loop thing gets old. Definitely depends on your gaming palette whether or not you'd like this game. I personally bored quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but really hard
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and arrived new in a case. According to my son: "The game is fun but it's hard because you have hardly any time to complete the quests. If you ever run out of time (which you probably will) it restarts you at the beginning of the time. I like Zelda Ocarina of Time better. "
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Classic game, great platform
customer_reviews.text: At this price, the classic is a must. Stays true to the game with any additions improving the gameplay. I was waiting for the $20 price point to get it and I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: EAM

customer_reviews.title: Not for preteens
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old didn't like the timer. Graphics gave him the willie's. Item was shipped on time . No problem with the seller
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Majora's Mask for 3DS must be a present - wished surpirise for birthday, this game don't work
customer_reviews.text: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D for Nintendo 3DS must be a present - wished surpirise for birthday, unfortunately this game don't work in Europe. It was very unpleasant for me and the child.

customer_reviews.title: Majora's Mask on the go
customer_reviews.text: Played it on console and really impressed with the improvements made for this version

customer_reviews.title: Comes Brand New In Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: The case comes plastic wrapped brand new. Plus it came with those cushions in the box so it wouldn't be thrown around during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!... Turns my anxiety on
customer_reviews.text: The game is good, I enjoyed it. Though sometimes it did feel like a chore to start playing again because of the Three day period. Its fun but it stresses me out and that combined with you can only save in certain areas really makes me panic every time I play it.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favourite game right now. It's filled with sidequests that make the game more interesting, and it's definitely one of the best zelda games. Great for nostalgia and good gameplay.

product_meta.title: Nintendo Selects: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask 3D - Nintendo 3DS
product_meta.description: Platform:Nintendo 3DSNintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this one. In three days, the moon will fall and the land of Termina will meet with a terrible fate. Can you save it in time? Relive the world's final 72 hours, solve elaborate puzzles, conquer dungeons, battle giant bosses, and befriend the doomed people of Termina in one of Nintendo's most suspenseful apocalyptic adventures ever.
feature_bullets: ESRB Rating: EVERYONE 10+ with Animated Blood, Fantasy Violence, Suggestive Themes
Nintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this one.
In three days, the moon will fall and the land of Termina will meet with a terrible fate. Can you save it in time?

Relive the world's final 72 hours, solve elaborate puzzles, conquer dungeons, battle giant bosses, and befriend the doomed people of Termina in one of Nintendo's most suspenseful apocalyptic adventures ever.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars778 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
